___callback.description: A function to be called right after MediaWiki processes this file

___descriptionmsg.description: Message key for a i18n message describing the extension.

___ExtensionFunctions.description: Function to call after setup has finished

___MessagesDirs.description: Directory paths containing JSON internationalization data

___GroupsRemoveFromSelf.description: Groups a user can remove from themselves

___url.description: URL to the homepage for the extension.

___JobClasses.description: Job types this extension implements (mapping of job type to class name)

___RecentChangesFlags.description: Flags (letter symbols) shown on RecentChanges pages

___GroupsAddToSelf.description: Groups a user can add to themselves

___license-name.description: Short identifier for the license under which the extension is released.

___ResourceFileModulePaths.description: Default paths to use for all ResourceLoader file modules

___remoteExtPath.description: Base path to prepend to all remote paths, relative to $wgExtensionAssetsPath

___remoteSkinPath.description: Base path to prepend to all remote paths, relative to $wgStylePath

___localBasePath.description: Base path to prepend to all local paths, relative to current directory

___Hooks.description: Hooks this extension uses (mapping of hook name to callback)

___RemoveGroups.description: Groups a user can remove from users

___ConfigRegistry.description: Registry of factory functions to create Config objects

___SpecialPageGroups.description: Mapping of special page name to group it belongs to

___ExtensionMessagesFiles.description: File paths containing PHP internationalization data

___SpecialPages.description: SpecialPages implemented in this extension (mapping of page name to class name)

___type.description: The extension's type, as an index to $wgExtensionCredits.

___version.description: The version of this release of the extension.

___languageScripts.description: Scripts to include in specific language contexts (mapping of language code to file path(s))

___scripts.description: Scripts to always include (array of file paths)

___loaderScripts.description: Scripts to include in the startup module

___remoteBasePath.description: Base path to prepend to all remote paths in $options. Defaults to $wgScriptPath

___dependencies.description: Modules which must be loaded before this module

___skinScripts.description: Scripts to include in specific skin contexts (mapping of skin name to script(s)

___localBasePath.description: Base path to prepend to all local paths in $options. Defaults to $IP

___debugScripts.description: Scripts to include in debug contexts

___remoteExtPath.description: Equivalent of remoteBasePath, but relative to $wgExtensionAssetsPath

___skinStyles.description: Styles to include in specific skin contexts (mapping of skin name to style(s))

___group.description: Group which this module should be loaded together with

___position.description: Position on the page to load this module at

___RevokePermissions.description: Default permissions to revoke from user groups

___AddGroups.description: Groups a user can add to users

___GroupPermissions.description: Default permissions to give to user groups

___ContentHandlers.description: Mapping of model ID to class name

___LogTypes.description: List of new log types this extension uses

___AvailableRights.description: User rights added by the extension
